about_the_game:
In this game mode, 2 to 4 players compete in an arena in which they can place bombs.

The goal is to blast these opponents while avoiding death.

Each player can plant bombs to blow up walls to clear a path or to kill other players.

During the game, assets, called bonuses, appear on the map to help players: Quick movement, expanded bomb explosion, etc.

The goal is simple: to be the only player left in the arena.
Also, on some arenas, things can get rougher.

Indeed, some arenas can have special effects: Pieces of arenas move in order to complicate the game.

Each game lasts until only one player remains in the arena.
